Title: Project Time Keeper
Description: Application will track your time spent on different projects. It is something like proof of concept for WPF MVVM with embedded database.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Application will track your time spent on different projects. It is something like proof of concept for WPF MVVM with embedded database.

Used technologies
  • Caliburn Micro
  • Castle Windsor
  • NHibernate
  • FluentNHibernate
  • FluentValidation
  • SQLite

What I want to add
  • Create some more intuitive and user friendly GUI
  • Unit Tests for already existing features and use TDD for future features

I will be more than happy if you will review code of this application and let me know if there is any minor or major mistakes.
